app.title: User Behavior Analytics Platform
app.usage_hint: Please upload GA4 NDJSON data file first, then select the corresponding analysis function

data_upload.title: 📁 GA4 Data Upload & Processing
data_upload.upload_ga4_file: Please upload GA4 exported NDJSON format file
data_upload.drag_drop_text: Drag and drop file here or click to browse
data_upload.ga4_ndjson_format: - **GA4 NDJSON Format**: NDJSON files exported from Google Analytics 4
data_upload.data_structure_requirement: - Files must contain complete event data structure
data_upload.supported_event_types: - Supported event types: page_view, sign_up, login, purchase, search, etc.
data_upload.required_fields: - Required fields: event_date, event_timestamp, event_name, user_pseudo_id, etc.
data_upload.processing_step_2: 2. Parse event data and user information

analysis.retention_periods_help: Analyze retention for how many periods
analysis.cluster_count_help: Number of clusters for K-Means algorithm
analysis.include_raw_data_help: Include raw data in export will increase file size
analysis.time_range_help: Select the time range for analysis
analysis.analysis_periods_help: Analyze retention for how many periods
analysis.funnel_steps_warning: ⚠️ Please select at least 2 steps to build conversion funnel
analysis.intelligent_description:
### Feature Description
The intelligent analysis module uses the system integration manager to complete comprehensive GA4 data analysis workflows through multi-agent collaboration.
Includes event analysis, retention analysis, conversion analysis, user segmentation, and path analysis.
analysis.parallel_processing_help: Execute multiple analysis tasks in parallel to improve performance
analysis.intelligent_cache_help: Cache analysis results to speed up subsequent execution
analysis.select_analysis_type_warning: ⚠️ Please select at least one analysis type
analysis.cluster_count_help: Number of clusters for K-Means algorithm
analysis.cannot_extract_features: ⚠️ Cannot extract user features, possible data format issue
analysis.check_required_fields_segmentation: Please check if data contains required fields (such as user_pseudo_id, event_name, etc.)
analysis.include_raw_data_help: Whether to include raw analysis data in export
analysis.custom_filename_placeholder: Leave empty to use default filename
analysis.key_insight_1: User activity is higher on weekdays, with some decline on weekends
analysis.key_insight_2: Mobile user share is gradually increasing, need to optimize mobile experience
analysis.key_insight_3: New user retention shows significant drop on day 7
analysis.key_insight_4: Purchase conversion funnel has highest drop-off rate at shopping cart stage
analysis.key_insight_5: High-value user segment is mainly concentrated in 25-35 age group
analysis.recommendation_1: **Optimize mobile experience**: Target mobile user growth trend, optimize mobile interface and interaction
analysis.recommendation_2: **Improve new user onboarding**: Strengthen guidance and incentive mechanisms for new users in first week
analysis.recommendation_3: **Optimize shopping cart flow**: Simplify checkout process from cart to reduce user drop-off
analysis.recommendation_4: **Precision marketing**: Develop personalized marketing strategies for high-value user segments
analysis.recommendation_5: **Boost weekend activity**: Launch weekend-exclusive activities and promotions to increase user engagement
analysis.custom_filename_placeholder: Leave empty to use default filename

export.recommendation_analyze_anomalies: Analyze anomalous path patterns to discover potential user confusion points
export.recommendation_focus_conversion: Focus on conversion path patterns to improve conversion efficiency
export.optimize_bottleneck: Focus on optimizing this step to improve overall conversion rate

intelligent.description: The intelligent analysis module uses AI technology to automatically analyze user behavior data and generate comprehensive insights and recommendations. Just select the analysis types you need and click start to get a complete analysis report.
intelligent.parallel_execution_help: Execute multiple analysis tasks in parallel to improve performance
intelligent.cache_results_help: Cache analysis results to speed up subsequent execution
intelligent.days_since_first_event: Days since user's first recorded event
intelligent.unique_event_types: Number of different event types per user
intelligent.weekend_activity_ratio: Ratio of weekend to weekday activity
intelligent.next_step_1: Develop personalized user experience strategies for each segment
intelligent.next_step_2: Optimize content and features for high-value user segments
intelligent.next_step_3: Implement targeted retention strategies for at-risk segments
intelligent.next_step_4: Create customized marketing campaigns for each user type
intelligent.next_step_5: Monitor segment migration patterns and user lifecycle changes

insights.insufficient_session_data: Insufficient session data to generate insights

insights.most_common_path: Most common user path is: {path}, appearing {frequency} times
insights.high_conversion_patterns: Found {count} high-conversion path patterns with conversion rates above 30%
insights.anomalous_patterns: Identified {count} anomalous user behavior patterns that require special attention

recommendations.optimize_common_path: Optimize the most common path '{path}' user experience

recommendations.maintain_monitoring: Current user paths perform well, continue monitoring key metric changes

results.low_conversion_rate: Most common path has low conversion rate, need to optimize key conversion points
results.analyze_success_factors: Analyze success factors of high-conversion paths and apply to other user flows
results.optimize_exit_point: Focus on optimizing {exit_point} stage to reduce user churn
results.low_session_conversion: Session conversion rate is low, need comprehensive user experience flow optimization
results.good_session_conversion: Session conversion rate performs well, can focus on improving conversion depth
results.long_user_paths: User paths are long, consider providing shortcuts and smart recommendations
results.short_user_paths: User paths are short, may indicate insufficient user engagement

flow.direct_conversion_efficient: Direct conversion path is most efficient
flow.optimize_high_dropoff: Optimize user experience for high drop-off steps

recommendations.low_quality_adjust_parameters: Segmentation quality is low, recommend adjusting segmentation parameters or feature selection
recommendations.good_quality_precision_marketing: Segmentation quality is good, can implement precision marketing based on this
recommendations.size_uneven_readjust_clusters: Segment sizes are uneven, recommend readjusting the number of clusters
recommendations.focus_high_value_retention: Focus on high-value user segments and develop specialized retention strategies
recommendations.small_segment_merge_or_target: {segment_name} user group is small, consider merging with other groups or developing precision marketing strategies
recommendations.large_segment_further_subdivide: {segment_name} user group is large, recommend further subdivision to provide more precise services
recommendations.can_develop_differentiated_strategies: Can develop differentiated user strategies based on current segmentation
recommendations.adjust_parameters_or_try_other_methods: Recommend adjusting segmentation parameters or trying other segmentation methods
recommendations.focus_high_value_needs_quality_service: Focus on high-value user group needs and provide quality services to improve retention
recommendations.develop_personalized_strategies_for_segm: Develop personalized marketing strategies for different groups
recommendations.optimize_high_value_user_experience: Optimize user experience for high-value groups
recommendations.design_personalized_experience_based_on_: Design personalized user experience based on main distinguishing features
